```{r setup}
library(ambient)
library(ambien)
```

```{r collage}
collage(
  generator = noise_worley,
  fractal = "billow",
  pertubation = "normal",
  pertubation_amplitude = 20,
  frequency = .01
)

collage(
  generator = noise_perlin,
  palette = "lajolla",
  fractal = "billow",
  pertubation = "normal",
  frequency = .01
)

collage(
  generator = noise_perlin,
  palette = "vik",
  fractal = "rigid-multi",
  pertubation = "none",
  frequency = .005
)

collage(
  generator = noise_value,
  palette = "bilbao",
  fractal = "billow",
  pertubation = "none",
  frequency = .005
)
```
